body:
Hello everyone! my name is Jono for those of you who didnt know and i have begun doing alot of youtube on avic.us!

it would be great to get your guys support in my videos and on my channel since you guys could one day be seen in a few of them since i record on many of the Games on avic.us

My YouTube is: https://www.youtube.com/user/InfernusJono 
Hope to see you all around i guarantee my videos will be only getting better, as my support gets higher.

Peace Out!

title: Check Me Out!

Subscribed :D

replies.body:
Dude, Ill take an Optifine cape plz :D

    Tip:   Add motion blur to your videos to make them seem like the have more fps, even at 30 fps with motion blur you have a decent 60 or 120 :)
